title: ISketch.SetDetachSegmentOnDrag
description: Sets the Detach Segment on Drag setting.

parameters.name: Detach
parameters.description: True to select Detach Segment on Drag , false to not

returns: True if Detach Segment on Drag is set, false if not
remarks: Although this setting can be returned or set at any time, SOLIDWORKS sets it to false upon exiting or entering a sketch. Thus, this method is only useful if called while a sketch is active.
